items.sentence: Tom got hit by a car while crossing the street.
It takes an hour to get to the station on foot.
It was hard to persuade him to cancel the trip.
That happened to you because you were careless.
Tom is the only one in our family who can swim.
Tom is the only one who can help you with that.
Tom is the only one who knows where Mary lives.
We came dangerously close to freezing to death.
I can\'t go with you because I have a bad cold.
Tom seldom does what he says he\'s going to do.
Tom told me he thought that he\'d win tomorrow.
I don\'t live in the same neighborhood anymore.
I don\'t think Tom would be willing to do that.
I don\'t think Tom would do this kind of thing.
You don\'t happen to know where Tom is, do you?
Tom smiled at Mary, but she didn\'t smile back.
They don\'t sell these kinds of things anymore.
If Tom was angry before, he\'ll be furious now.
You\'re welcome to come with us if you want to.
You\'ve got my sunglasses and I want them back.
